values: 兜；衣兜；衣袋；口袋；小袋；小容器；小块地区；钱财；资金；财力；（与周围不同的）小组织；（台球或撞球桌上的）球袋；[地质]矿脉囊
放入口袋；私吞；窃取；隐藏；把（钱等贵重物品）据为己有；中饱私囊；把…放进衣袋；将（球）击入球袋

synonym.mean: 小型的，袖珍的；金钱上的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可放在口袋里的；可供私用的；可隐藏的

word_group.brief_definition: 有够多钱的；还有钱的；赚了钱的；赚来的

word_group.phrase: put one's hand in one's pocket

bilingual.source: He put the keys in his pocket.
It carries its babies in a pocket.
There's a pocket on the front of my shirt.
bilingual.target: 我的衬衫前面有一个口袋。

bilingual.source: I've got the camera in the pocket of my sweatshirt.
bilingual.target: 我的相机在我的运动衫口袋里。

bilingual.source: It's simpler to use than a dictionary and it fits easily into your pocket.
bilingual.target: 它比词典更容易使用，而且可以轻松放进口袋。

bilingual.source: He took a pocket watch out of his pocket.
bilingual.target: 他从口袋里掏出一块怀表。
他的短裤上有一个口袋。

bilingual.source: His pocket has a hole in it.
There is a note in my pocket.
bilingual.target: 我的口袋里有一张纸条。

list.abstract: POCKET（英[ˈpɒkɪt]，美[ˈpɑːkɪt]），英语单词。作名词为衣袋；小块；腰包。作形容词为便携的；袖珍的；小型的。作动词为放入口袋；包；围。例句：There is a key in the pocket.（口袋里有一把钥匙）。 作名词时，近义词为money、container、vessel。作及物动词时，lock、stomach、stand。作形容词时，近义词为miniative、baby-size。
pocket是一个英语单词，可以用作名词、及物动词和形容词，可以翻译为口袋、金钱，等等。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, but the ones in my pocket are mine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，但我口袋里的可不给别人用。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, that's like money in your pocket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯，那其实就像是进了你们的口袋一样啊？

yingyinNormal.en: I believe the law degree in my pocket says so.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我口袋里的法律学位可以证明我是。

yingyinNormal.en: Something that conveniently enough, lies in your pocket. Stop him!
yingyinNormal.zh: 有一样东西能解决问题，这件东西现在近在咫尺，就在你的口袋里，抓住他。

yingyinNormal.en: She is so cute. You could fit her right in your little pocket. She could fit in that little pocket inside the pocket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她真可爱，可以塞进口袋里。可以塞进口袋的小口袋里。

yingyinNormal.en: Three coins from a dead man's pocket, two teaspoons of wishful thinking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 三枚死人口袋里的硬币，两勺希望。

yingyinNormal.en: You gotta lose that human pocket, okay? Oh, this a fanny pack.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你把人类的口袋扔掉，行吗？这只是个腰包。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Max! Caroline! And I keep my heart pills in my pocket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦克斯！卡洛琳！而且口袋里随身带着心脏病药。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a music player. It's a thousand songs in your pocket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一款音乐播放器，上千首的歌就装在你的口袋里。

yingyinNormal.en: X number of customers equals X number of dollars in the company' pocket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有多少客户就意味着有多少钱进了公司的口袋。

yingyinNormal.en: You carry glitter in your pocket. I used to carry butterflies, but...
yingyinNormal.zh: 你口袋里竟然装着彩纸。我以前还装蝴蝶来着，可是……

yingyinNormal.en: Because I folded it up and put it in my pants pocket. Do you not look there?
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为我折起来放到裤子口袋里了，你没有去找过吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You see? You've got a bit of me all the time. Okay. Put it back in your pocket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看吧？我身体的部分一直陪着你，放回你口袋里。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you remember where you last put them, Daddy Pig? When I don't wear them, I always put them in my pocket. But they aren't there now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还记得最后把眼镜放在哪了吗？我不戴的时候都是把眼镜放在口袋里的，但现在不在口袋里。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you remember where you last put them, Daddy Pig? When I don't wear them, I always put them in my pocket. But they aren't there now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还记得最后把眼镜放在哪了吗？我不戴的时候都是把眼镜放在口袋里的，但现在不在口袋里。

yingyinNormal.en: I just put something in your pocket. It's good at all El Pollo Locos.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在你口袋里放了点东西。在所有的疯鸡墨西哥餐厅都能使用。

yingyinNormal.en: $14, huh? Put it back in your pocket, or I'll find some other place to put it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 14块？放回你的口袋里，要不然我会找个其他的地方搁。

yingyinNormal.en: Good. That's good. Show you me how you're gonna pull the note out of your pocket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，这样很好，跟我...跟我演一遍你该怎么把纸条从口袋拿出来。

yingyinNormal.en: You have an order in your left pocket that says that I'm a deserter impersonating an officer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的左侧口袋里有一封传令说我是个逃兵，因为冒充军官被抓。

yingyinNormal.en: Dave will bow to Kim then shake his hand, immediately disposing of the strip in his jacket pocket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 戴夫要给金正恩鞠躬，然后握手，马上把贴边放入衣服口袋。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a small bag sewn into a piece of clothing for carrying small articles

examination_example.sentence: These kids are going to be surrounded by computers — in their <highlight>pockets</highlight>, in their offices, in their homes — for the rest of their lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些孩子将在到处是计算机的环境中——在他们口袋里，在他们的办公室里，在他们家里——度过余生。

examination_example.sentence: But once we rip off the band-aid, tuck our smartphones in our <highlight>pockets</highlight> and look up, it doesn't hurt so bad.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但一旦我们撕掉创可贴，把智能手机塞进口袋，抬头一看，就没那么疼了。

sense_info_list.en: the amount of money that someone has for spending

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a small bag sewn into a piece of clothing for carrying small articles

examination_example.sentence: Months later, she was still finding cash stuffed in her trouser <highlight>pockets</highlight> and the <highlight>pockets</highlight> of her handbags.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几个月后，她仍然发现现金塞在她的裤兜和手袋的口袋里。

examination_example.sentence: The latest iPhone 6s, for example, has a dual-core processor and fits nicely into your <highlight>pocket</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，最新的iPhone 6s有一个双核处理器，可以很好地放入口袋。

sense_info_list.en: the amount of money that someone has for spending

examination_example.sentence: Enrollees would have to pay more money for many services out of their own <highlight>pockets</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参保者将不得不自掏腰包为许多服务支付更多钱。

word_usage.usage:
pocket表“衣袋, 口袋”时，为可数名词。“把手放在口袋里”用in one's pocket表达，而不用in the pocket。
示例：The man stood with his hands in his pockets.
那个男人双手插在兜里站着。

pocket指“口袋里的钱财”时，为不可数名词，常以单数形式出现。
示例：We have holidays to suit every pocket.
我们有适合各种程度消费的度假方式。

examination_example.sentence: He found the 60 pounds in his <highlight>pocket</highlight> missing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他发现口袋里的60英镑不见了。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一种为容纳平板电脑而设计的带有大口袋的新型实验室大衣的标语。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: In fact plenty of younger kids have one in their <highlight>pocket</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，很多小孩口袋里都会装一个。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a small bag sewn into a piece of clothing for carrying small articles

examination_example.sentence: So we emptied our <highlight>pockets</highlight>, and all our money added up to $3.28.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 于是我们掏空了口袋，所有的钱加起来有3.28美元。

examination_example.sentence: I found Grandma's wallet and put the quarter in my <highlight>pocket</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我找到奶奶的钱包，把25美分的硬币放在我的口袋里。

examination_example.sentence: There is a key in the <highlight>pocket</highlight>.
Parents can put <highlight>pocket</highlight> money directly into their child's bank account.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母可以把零花钱直接存入孩子的银行账户。

examination_example.sentence: This summer there are things that students can do to earn some <highlight>pocket</highlight> money or to help others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年夏天，学生们可以做一些事情来赚一些零花钱或帮助别人。

examination_example.sentence: A part-time job is a choice for teenagers who don't have <highlight>pocket</highlight> money or who want to get extra money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 兼职工作是没有零花钱或者想赚外快的青少年的选择。

那个男人双手插在兜里站着。

pocket指“口袋里的钱财”时，为不可数名词，常以单数形式出现。
示例：We have holidays to suit every pocket.
我们有适合各种程度消费的度假方式。
